title: Team Ranked?
body: Me and my friend had taken a break from league. When we came back our ranked team was "inactive" however I could not find a way to play team ranked. What are the new requirements to play team ranked.

replies.body: Zombiemaster provided some solid insight here.  Ranked Teams are indeed currently on a schedule and will appear depending on the day.  Make sure to check the[ ranked team ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule)schedule for details.  Best of luck!

Ranked teams, both 3s and 5s, are now only available at certain times of the day. You can find the schedule for each region [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule).

For NA, ranked teams is available from 4pm to midnight PDT on weekdays and from 2pm to midnight on weekends.
